definition: to sow/to scatter/to spread/to broadcast/Taiwan pr. [bo4]
to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)

sentences.english: Why aren't my APE files played?
sentences.chinese: 播放機可播放什麼文件類型？

sentences.english: Limits the amount of bandwidth that is available for all unicast players connected to this publishing point.
sentences.chinese: 限制所有連接到該發佈點的單播播放機的可用帶寬量。

sentences.english: Do you really need to turn on the DVD in the car?
sentences.chinese: 你真的有必要在開車時打開車裏的DVD播放機嗎？

sentences.english: This single DIN car DVD player really has it all.
sentences.chinese: 這種單錠DVD播放機真正擁有一切。

sentences.english: Limits the amount of bandwidth that is available for all connected unicast players connected to this publishing point.
sentences.chinese: 限制連接到該發佈點的所有單播播放機的可用帶寬量。

sentences.english: Prepare a tape player, like a cassette tape recorder.
sentences.chinese: 準備一個錄音帶播放機，如盒式磁帶錄音機。

sentences.english: They've just lent me a laser disc player.
sentences.chinese: 他們剛借了我一部激光視盤播放機。
